story.iWant: an About page and Community Guidelines that set expectations
story.soThat: users understand the community purpose and behavioral standards

task.description: Create About page using Forem Pages feature

subtasks.subtask: Access Forem Admin Panel → Pages → New Page
Set slug to "about" and title to "About Vibecoding Community"

task.description: Create Community Guidelines page using Forem Pages feature

Set slug to "community-guidelines" and title to "Community Guidelines"

Explain self-promotion policy (ANYON showcases encouraged, other products require context/value)
Document moderation policy (warnings, suspensions, bans)
Explain consequences for guideline violations (escalation path)
Add "How to report issues" section (flag posts, contact moderators)
Publish page and verify accessible at /community-guidelines

Add "About" link to footer navigation
Add "Community Guidelines" link to footer navigation
Verify links appear in footer on all pages
Test footer navigation links on mobile and desktop
Review Forem's user registration flow (typically /users/sign_up)
Check if Forem has built-in "Accept Community Guidelines" checkbox option
If built-in option exists, enable it via Admin Panel → Config → Community
If not, add link to guidelines in registration confirmation email
Alternatively, add guidelines reference to welcome message for new users
Verify new users see guidelines reference during or immediately after signup

file.reason: Core Page model that handles static pages. Supports Markdown rendering, slug validation, SEO fields (social_image, description), and multiple templates (contained, full_within_layout, nav_bar_included, json, css, txt).
Handles rendering of static pages. Includes predefined routes for common pages like /about, /code-of-conduct, /privacy, /terms. Shows how to create and serve pages via slug-based routing.

Database schema for pages table. Columns: slug, title, description, body_markdown, body_html, processed_html, social_image, template, is_top_level_path, landing_page, subforem_id. Unique index on (slug, subforem_id).

constraints.constraint: Use Forem's built-in Pages feature - no custom code files required for this story
Pages must be created via Forem Admin Panel (Admin Panel → Pages → New Page)
Content must use Markdown formatting for body_markdown field
Template must be "contained" (default) or other TEMPLATE_OPTIONS if needed
SEO fields required: title, description, social_image (optional)
Footer navigation links added via Admin Panel → Customization → Config → Footer
Performance requirement: Page load time < 1.5 seconds for static pages
Content tone: Friendly, approachable, not corporate/stiff
ANYON positioning: Authentic connection, not sales pitch
Git commits (if config files changed): Use [VIBECODING] prefix
No custom CSS classes needed unless: Use .vibecoding-about-* or .vibecoding-guidelines-* pattern

tests.standards:
This story is primarily admin panel-driven content creation with no custom code. Testing approach focuses on: 1. Content Review: Mission clarity, tone, completeness, SEO optimization 2. Navigation Testing: Verify footer links work, pages accessible via URL 3. Responsive Testing: Pages render correctly on mobile, tablet, desktop 4. Accessibility Testing: Lighthouse accessibility score > 90, keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility 5. Performance Testing: Page load time < 1.5 seconds, Lighthouse performance score > 90 6. SEO Validation: Meta tags present and optimized (title, description, OG tags) 7. No unit tests required for admin panel-driven content pages
Testing Framework: Lighthouse for performance/accessibility/SEO audits. Manual QA for content review and navigation.
